mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT ( COMMENT_SEQ, COMMENT_BODY, COMMENT_DATE, USER_ID, BOARD_SEQ ) VALUES ( 0, #{commentBody}, #{commentDate}, #{userId}, #{boardSeq} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq, BOARD_TITLE AS strTitle, BOARD_DATE AS strDate, BOARD_CONTENT AS strContent, USER_ID AS userId FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_SEQ = #{id}
SELECT COMMENT_SEQ AS commentSeq, COMMENT_BODY AS commentBody, COMMENT_DATE AS commentDate, USER_ID AS userId, BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq FROM COMMENT WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ AS boardSeq, BOARD_TITLE AS strTitle, BOARD_DATE AS strDate, USER_ID AS userId FROM FREE_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE UPPER(#{search}) ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENT WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{id} AND COMMENT_SEQ = #{commentId}
